long_description: The women's Filtrate Verse Sunglasses feature premium hand-made acetate frames, high-grade polycarbonate lenses and 5-barrel stainless-steel hinges for performance, quality and style. Optically correct CR-39 lenses are made of hardened resin; they weigh half as much as glass with superior scratch- and impact-resistance. Zebra frames feature gray-tinted lenses for glare reduction with no color distortion. Individually hand-crafted acetate frame sports a premium finish and a personalized touch.
short_description: The women's Filtrate Verse Sunglasses feature premium hand-made acetate frames, high-grade polycarbonate lenses and 5-barrel stainless-steel hinges for performance, quality and style.
